Articles.Content:
After being a long time lurker here, i finally decided to share some of my experience in KSP among all of you that helped me so much understand the game mechanincs, and more important, some nice knowledge about rocket physics, orbits ecc...

Thank you! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Welcome aboard! I'm gonna be searching for your stuff from now on, I'm sure it's all very entertaining!
I was also a luker here for quite a long time before I registered, and it is always nice to see others join. Welcome to the land of the posters!
